apiKeyManagement.title: API Key Management
apiKeyManagement.description: Generate and manage API keys for external integrations
apiKeyManagement.infoText: Generate API keys to securely submit data from external applications like iPhone Shortcuts. These keys are tied to your account and can be revoked at any time.
apiKeyManagement.wikiWarning: Refer to the Wiki page in Github for sample setup instructions for iPhone and Android.
apiKeyManagement.deleteApiKeyConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this API key? This action cannot be undone.
